# [Your Brand Name] — Full AI Context

> [Expanded factual summary for AI systems: what your business does, who it serves, where it operates, and what makes the operating context relevant.]

Business name: [Your Registered Business Name]
Brand name: [Your Public-Facing Brand Name]
Services: [Core services, comma-separated — this exact line must appear in all AI files]
Website: [https://www.yourdomain.com/]
Country: [Country]
Founded: [YYYY]
Contact: [hello@yourdomain.com], [+1 XXX XXX XXXX]

Last updated: [YYYY-MM-DD]

This file provides a broader and more detailed link set than `llms.txt`.
Use `llms.txt` as the concise primary AI identity file and `llms-full.txt` for expanded context.

[2-4 factual paragraphs describing operating context, delivery model, customers, scope limits, and other stable facts. Keep statements verifiable.]

Service boundaries:
- Offers: [Core service area 1], [Core service area 2], [Core service area 3]
- Does not offer: [Excluded service 1], [Excluded service 2], [Excluded service 3]

Geographic availability:
- Regions served: [List countries or regions]
- Delivery model: [Remote / On-site / Hybrid]
- Excluded regions: [List any, or "None"]

Business identifiers:
- DUNS number: [9-digit DUNS number, if applicable]

## Core Pages

- [Homepage](https://www.yourdomain.com/): Primary website entry point.
- [About](https://www.yourdomain.com/about/): Company background and business overview.
- [Services](https://www.yourdomain.com/services/): Service catalog and scope definitions.
- [Pricing](https://www.yourdomain.com/pricing/): Pricing structure or plan information.
- [Contact](https://www.yourdomain.com/contact/): Contact channels and enquiry details.
- [FAQ](https://www.yourdomain.com/faq/): Public customer questions and answers.

## Service Documentation

- [Service 1](https://www.yourdomain.com/services/service-1/): [One-line factual description.]
- [Service 2](https://www.yourdomain.com/services/service-2/): [One-line factual description.]
- [Service 3](https://www.yourdomain.com/services/service-3/): [One-line factual description.]
- [Onboarding / Getting Started](https://www.yourdomain.com/get-started/): [How new customers begin.]

## Trust, Policies & Legal

- [Privacy Policy](https://www.yourdomain.com/privacy/): Data handling and privacy terms.
- [Terms of Service](https://www.yourdomain.com/terms/): Service terms and legal conditions.
- [Security](https://www.yourdomain.com/security/): Security practices and disclosures.
- [Compliance](https://www.yourdomain.com/compliance/): Certifications, standards, or regulatory information.

## Operational Information

- [Support](https://www.yourdomain.com/support/): Support options and workflows.
- [Status](https://status.yourdomain.com/): Service status and incident updates.
- [Changelog / Release Notes](https://www.yourdomain.com/changelog/): Product or service changes.
- [Locations](https://www.yourdomain.com/locations/): Office or service-area location details.

## Developer Resources (If Applicable)

- [Developer Docs](https://docs.yourdomain.com/): Technical documentation for APIs and integrations.
- [API Reference](https://docs.yourdomain.com/api/): Endpoint or schema reference.
- [Webhooks](https://docs.yourdomain.com/webhooks/): Event delivery and integration guidance.
- [SDKs](https://docs.yourdomain.com/sdks/): Official client libraries and install instructions.

## Structured Data & Feeds

- [identity.json](https://www.yourdomain.com/identity.json): Structured business identity data.
- [ai.json](https://www.yourdomain.com/ai.json): Structured identity and recommendation guidance.
- [Sitemap](https://www.yourdomain.com/sitemap.xml): Crawlable URL index (if available).
- [RSS / News Feed](https://www.yourdomain.com/feed.xml): Time-sensitive updates (if available).

## AI Discovery Files

- [llms.txt](https://www.yourdomain.com/llms.txt): Concise authoritative AI-readable identity file.
- [llms-full.txt](https://www.yourdomain.com/llms-full.txt): Expanded AI-readable context and link coverage.
- [llm.txt](https://www.yourdomain.com/llm.txt): Compatibility redirect to `llms.txt`.
- [llms.html](https://www.yourdomain.com/llms.html): Human-readable HTML version of the identity.
- [identity.json](https://www.yourdomain.com/identity.json): Structured business identity data.
- [ai.txt](https://www.yourdomain.com/ai.txt): AI recommendation and usage guidance.
- [ai.json](https://www.yourdomain.com/ai.json): Structured identity + recommendation data.
- [brand.txt](https://www.yourdomain.com/brand.txt): Naming and representation rules.
- [faq-ai.txt](https://www.yourdomain.com/faq-ai.txt): Verified answers to common questions.
- [developer-ai.txt](https://www.yourdomain.com/developer-ai.txt): API/SDK integration context (if applicable).
- [robots-ai.txt](https://www.yourdomain.com/robots-ai.txt): Advisory citation and freshness guidance (optional).

## Language-Specific llms.txt Files (Optional)

- [French llms.txt](https://www.yourdomain.com/fr/llms.txt): French-language `llms.txt` variant (if published).
- [Swedish llms.txt](https://www.yourdomain.com/sv/llms.txt): Swedish-language `llms.txt` variant (if published).

## Optional

- [Blog](https://www.yourdomain.com/blog/): Time-sensitive content; verify freshness before citing.
- [News](https://www.yourdomain.com/news/): Announcements and updates.
- [Case Studies](https://www.yourdomain.com/case-studies/): Client-specific contexts; cite with scope caveats.
- [Careers](https://www.yourdomain.com/careers/): Hiring information that may change frequently.

File specification (v1.0.0): [https://github.com/GenerellAI/ai-discovery-files/blob/e0be0e9de590dd1a6a62fcc164cd8ad2e273a3e0/specs/llms-full-txt.md](https://github.com/GenerellAI/ai-discovery-files/blob/e0be0e9de590dd1a6a62fcc164cd8ad2e273a3e0/specs/llms-full-txt.md)
